channel.title: Smf Forum
channel.description: Well idk why but all of the smfnew sites wont load for me, witch kinda sucks because i use smfnew for my server forums.. I tried clearing my cache, didn't work, then i thought maybe it was just my computer, but it wont work my my laptop ether.. is it doing this for anyone else?

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @fizzyscape fizzyscape
item.description:
@fizzyscape wrote:

No. It’s my uncles actually

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“fizzyscape, post:13, topic:375386”]Free hosting is good. But because it’s free there are downsides, such as server going down

the best thing you could do is buy your own hosting (usually done when buying a domain) and then pay somebody to build and operate your forum for you. I’ve found a place where this is done very cheaply. http://deggerz.com

you should check it out[/quote]

No one will pay for a forum to be made for them.

Prices:
1 Forum: £20 ($31.22)
2 Forums: £37.50 ($58.50)
3 or more Forums: £15 each ($23.42)

Is it your site by any chance?

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @fizzyscape fizzyscape
item.description:
@fizzyscape wrote:

Free hosting is good. But because it’s free there are downsides, such as server going down

the best thing you could do is buy your own hosting (usually done when buying a domain) and then pay somebody to build and operate your forum for you. I’ve found a place where this is done very cheaply. http://deggerz.com

you should check it out

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“EMINEM BEAST™, post:10, topic:375386”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=471341.msg3450179#msg3450179 date=1293684901]

Well idk why but all of the smfnew sites wont load for me, witch kinda sucks because i use smfnew for my server forums… I tried clearing my cache, didn’t work, then i thought maybe it was just my computer, but it wont work my my laptop ether… is it doing this for anyone else?

build your own damn forum?![/quote]Why are you so mad?..

don’t use SMF new. download the smf src off their website and transfer them via FTP to your webhost. x10hosting is free.

I would love to do that but, idk how to do that kind of stuff :s[/quote]
PM me your MSN :… i’ll teach you about it if you want me to

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:7, topic:375386”][quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=471341.msg3447304#msg3447304 date=1293512461]
Well idk why but all of the smfnew sites wont load for me, witch kinda sucks because i use smfnew for my server forums… I tried clearing my cache, didn’t work, then i thought maybe it was just my computer, but it wont work my my laptop ether… is it doing this for anyone else?
[/quote]
build your own damn forum?![/quote]Why are you so mad?..

Liquid Magic:

don’t use SMF new. download the smf src off their website and transfer them via FTP to your webhost. x10hosting is free.

I would love to do that but, idk how to do that kind of stuff :s

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Explisionist:

Use SMF v2.0. It is much more reliable than SMFNEW.

This. There are plenty of free webhosts available and using SMF 2.0 gives you so much more control over your forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Forum
item.dc:creator: @lotto320 lotto320
item.description:
@lotto320 wrote:

EMINEM BEAST™, recommending you to dont use SMFNEW, just simply get a free domain with mySQL,PHP and FTP… like 50gigs.net then just download SMF V2.0 RC4 from Simplemachines.org and transfer the files to your FTP ;D
